Trigger A creature within 30 feet deals damage to you.

In your trance, you are on guard to those that would try and stand in your path. You call upon the inner power to unleash a reprisal. @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.macros.Macro.xumjguwPtOtkC7tL]{Spend your Zeal}. The effects of the Zenith depends on the Zeal spent:

  • 1 Zeal: The creature takes @Damage[(max(10,(floor(@actor.level/4)*5))-5)[spirit]] damage.

  • 2-3 Zeal: As 1 Zeal, but you also gain resistance 4 to the triggering damage. @UUID[Compendium.immortal-ardor.classes.irnuEVaa7o17vPO3]{Effect: Armor of Zeal}

  • 4-5 Zeal: As above, but you also can make a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VjxZFuUXrCU94MWR]{Strike} against the triggering creature if you can reach them with an attack.

Level (+4) The damage increases by 5 and the resistance increases by 2.
